title: STAMICO hands SA’s Plantcor a deal to explore the gold deposit in Geita
desc: GEITA: The State Mining Corporation (STAMICO) has signed an agreement with Plantcor Mining and Plant Hire (Pty) Ltd of South Africa to implement a gold exploration and mining project in the Kigosi area, Bukombe District, Geita Region. title: Businessman refuses to pull down mega-garage he built without permission
